scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist/lib && ./node_modules/.bin/sass -I ./node_modules/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap.scss --error-css --style compressed ./scss/custom.scss ./dist/css/custom.css && mv ./lib/main.js ./dist/lib/main.js && mv ./index.html ./dist/index.html && mv ./tyrianapp.js ./dist/lib/tyrianapp.js && mv ./httpd.conf ./dist/httpd.conf
